ProjectTitle: Targeting the neural mechanisms of human safety learning
InitialFeedbackHistory: 03/06/2024 [REDACTED] when sharing data on OSF please make sure it is fully anonymous without any risk to re-identify the subjects. [REDACTED] this is not possible, you can use RDR where you can restrict access to the files with sensitive data, RDR has an integration dashboard to make it easier to upload data from OSF: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard; contact pret@leuven.be if you are not sure if your data is pseudonymous or anonymous, or if you have further questions about sharing of pseudonymous/anonymous data.
label: good with suggestions
